findings.title: Centralization Risks
findings.description: The role owner has the authority to update critical settings and manage lists containing contracts, which poses centralization risks.

findings.title: Non-Compliant Variable Naming Convention
findings.description: The variable ERC20TokenImplementation._decimals does not follow the mixedCase naming convention as per Solidity standards.

findings.title: Redundant expression "this"
findings.description: The 'this' keyword is used redundantly in an expression.

findings.title: renounceOwnership() should be declared external
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function should be declared as an external function.

findings.title: transferOwnership(address) should be declared external
findings.description: The transferOwnership function with an address parameter should be declared as an external function.

findings.title: increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external
findings.description: The function increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared as an external function.

findings.title: Function Visibility Issue
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) function should be declared as external to follow best practices and ensure proper visibility.

findings.title: mint(uint256) should be declared external
findings.description: The mint function with a uint256 parameter should be declared as an external function.

findings.title: burn(uint256) should be declared external
findings.description: The burn function with uint256 parameter should be declared as an external function.

findings.title: currentStartPrice() Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The function currentStartPrice() should be declared as external to follow best practices and improve contract security.

findings.title: currentStartTimeStamp() should be declared external
findings.description: The function currentStartTimeStamp() should be declared as an external function.
